subject: Re: My brain dump for the PMCs PDD
body:
Leopold Toetsch wrote:
> 
> This is what the cstruct-Proposal is for. The cstruct is describing the 
> internals of a PMC (which happen to consist of C structure items)

Aye. For general information, these are the current draft PDDs that I'm 
merging into 1 (or 2) PMC PDDs.

pdd02_vtables.pod
pdd04_datatypes.pod
pdd08_keys.pod
pdd14_bignum.pod
pdd17_basic_types.pod
pddXX_cstruct.pod
pddXX_pmc.pod

Allison
